member.name: M:Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Razor.ProjectSystem.ProjectSnapshot.GetRelatedDocuments(Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Razor.ProjectSystem.DocumentSnapshot)
member.summary: If the provided document is an import document, gets the other documents in the project that include directives specified by the provided document. Otherwise returns an empty list.

member.name: P:Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Razor.ProjectSystem.ProjectState.Version
member.summary: Gets the version of this project, INCLUDING content changes. The is incremented for each new instance created.

member.name: P:Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Razor.ProjectSystem.ProjectState.DocumentCollectionVersion
member.summary: Gets the version of this project, NOT INCLUDING computed or content changes. The is incremented each time the configuration changes or a document is added or removed.

member.name: P:Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Razor.ProjectSystem.ProjectState.ProjectWorkspaceStateVersion
member.summary: Gets the version of this project based on the project workspace state, NOT INCLUDING content changes. The computed state is guaranteed to change when the configuration or tag helpers change.

member.name: T:Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Razor.Serialization.Internal.StringCache
member.summary: This class helps de-duplicate dynamically created strings which might otherwise lead to memory bloat.

member.name: T:Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Razor.Serialization.Internal.StringCache.ExfiltratingEqualityComparer
member.summary: This is a gross hack to do a sneaky and get the value inside the HashSet out given the lack of any Get operations in netstandard2.0. If we ever upgrade to 2.1 delete this and just use the built in TryGetValue method.
member.remarks: This is fragile on the ordering of the values passed to the EqualityComparer by HashSet. If that ever switches we have to react, if it becomes indeterminate we have to abandon this strategy.
